downloadTitle: Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 White Paper: Intercompany Tax API Changes
downloadDescription: This white paper describes new parameters that have been added to existing methods.
detailsSection: This white paper describes new parameters that have been added to existing methods, and also new methods that have been added, to support sale tax obligations for intercompany transactions.
systemRequirementsSection:
• To view the PDF file, you will need a PDF reader, such as the free Adobe Reader.
  • For information about the system requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012, see System requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click Download to download the file in PDF file format.
  2. Save the file to your computer.
